--in this case, i'm determining which product is top-selling by the total amount of money generated by the sales of that product

SELECT ProductID, ProductName, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity) AS Amount
FROM Products p
INNER JOIN 'Order Details' od
USING (ProductID)
GROUP BY ProductName
ORDER BY Amount DESC
LIMIT 3;


--in this case, i'm determining the top-selling product by the quantity of products sold
